title: 2009 Cardinal Forest River 40’ Travel Trailer
item_description:
2009 Forest River Cardinal 40’ Travel Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Make: Forest River
  • Model: Cardinal
  • VIN: 4X4FCAK299G095419
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 15500 Lbs
  • Trailer Type: Travel Trailer

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 476”
  • Overall Width: 173”
  • Overall Height: 132”
  • Deck Length: 433”
  • Deck Width: 168”
  • Side Height: 101”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 152/127 La
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way RV Blade
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel
  • Features:
    • Four Side outs
    • Queen Size Bed with Closet Area
    • Full Shower
    • Electric Fire Place
    • 28” TV
    • (2) Leather Recline Chairs
    • Cloth Couch With Pull out Storage
    • 4-Piece Dining Set
    • Queen Size Mattress
  • Kitchen:
    • Magic Chef Gas Stove
    • Apelle Microwave Oven
    • Built-In Dometic Refrigerator and Freezer
  • Slide outs are operational and were tested. See video

Note: Previously registered in Alberta, Canada. The seller purchased this trailer on 6/26/2014 from Ritchie Brothers Canada and has a Bill of Sale only, NO TITLE. The Seller has not transferred registration from Canada to the United States. The Buyer will receive a Bill of Sale and the Seller's previous paperwork. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of new registration, inspections, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
